title: Study reveals stigmatizing responses in LLMs for addiction-related queries
description: As artificial intelligence is rapidly developing and becoming a growing presence in healthcare communication, a new study addresses a concern that large language models (LLMs) can reinforce harmful stereotypes by using stigmatizing language.
content:

title: China's premier proposes global co-operation on AI
description: China's Premier Li Qiang has emphasised the need for more co-ordination between countries to form a globally recognised framework for artificial intelligence.
content:
Chinese Premier Li Qiang has proposed establishing an organisation to foster global co-operation on artificial intelligence, calling on countries to coordinate on the development and security of the fast-evolving technology.

title: White House lashes out at ‘South Park’ Trump parody
description: LOS ANGELES, California — The White House lashed out at the creators of “South Park” on Thursday after the bawdy satirical program skewered Donald Trump in an episode featuring an artificial intelligence (AI)-generated version of the United States president crawling naked through a desert.

title: Nishijinori weaving meets AI, a new era for Kyoto's kimonos
description: Nishijinori, the intricate weaving for kimonos that dates back more than a thousand years in Japan's ancient capital of Kyoto, is getting a modern-day high-tech collaborator: artificial intelligence.
content:
KYOTO, Japan (AP) — Nishijinori, the intricate weaving technique for kimonos that dates back more than a thousand years in Japan’s ancient capital of Kyoto, is getting a high-tech collaborator: artificial intelligence.

title: Trump's AI plan aims to cement tech ties to GOP
description: At an artificial intelligence forum in Washington, DC, on Wednesday, Donald Trump gave his first speech detailing the White House's new AI strategy.
content:
